author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO MOVE AWAY FROM THE U.S. COAST AND STAY NORTH OF BERMUDA...
summary: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO MOVE AWAY FROM THE U.S. COAST AND STAY NORTH OF BERMUDA... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Aug 04 the center of Dexter was located near 34.6, -68.3 with movement ENE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO MOVE AWAY FROM THE U.S. COAST AND STAY NORTH OF BERMUDA... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Aug 04 the center of Dexter was located near 34.6, -68.3 with movement ENE at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
